about-nukkit: Nuclear powered MCPE Server, has a PocketMine-like structure and Java-armed strength. Developed for multiplayer survival games.
title-donate-sub: All donations will be used to cover server costs, services and software licensing, and only for Nukkit.
title-details: Make a server beyond your imagination.
detail-1: Feel free to use Nukkit in your native language.
detail-2: Provides a wide range of settings to fully control your server.
detail-3: Enchanting, redstone, weather and a multiworld system.
detail-4: Java armed, super fast and light.
detail-5: Has someone mentioned a wonderful game? Add plugins and enjoy amazing new features!
